item.title: Learn english from Ubuntu 22.04 Codename
item.description: 從 Ubuntu Codename 學點英文 (?) ‘Jammy Jellyfish’ Jammy is an interesting adjective. Broadly speaking it means to be filled with jam (what American’s call jelly) or something that has the consistency of jam. But the word ‘jammy’ is also used informally in the UK to mean someone or something that is very lucky or fortunate, e.g., “that jammy cat had an extra plate of milk!”. Jellyfish is “a sea creature with a body like jelly and long thin parts called tentacles that can give a sharp sting,
